mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.forum_name as forumName ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.zhuanjia_id as zhuanjiaId ,a.users_id as usersId ,a.forum_content as forumContent ,a.super_ids as superIds ,a.forum_state_types as forumStateTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_name as zhuanjiaName ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_phone as zhuanjiaPhone ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_id_number as zhuanjiaIdNumber ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_photo as zhuanjiaPhoto ,zhuanjia.zhuanjia_email as zhuanjiaEmail ,users.username as uusername ,users.password as upassword ,users.role as urole ,users.addtime as uaddtime
FROM forum a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN zhuanjia zhuanjia ON a.zhuanjia_id = zhuanjia.id left JOIN users users ON a.users_id = users.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.forum_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumName},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.zhuanjia_id = #{params.zhuanjiaId} )
and ( a.users_id = #{params.usersId} )
and a.forum_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumContent},'%')
and a.super_ids >= #{params.superIdsStart}
and a.super_ids <= #{params.superIdsEnd}
and a.super_ids = #{params.superIds}
and a.forum_state_types = #{params.forumStateTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.zhuanjia_id IS NOT NULL
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaName},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaPhone},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaIdNumber},'%')
and zhuanjia.zhuanjia_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanjiaEmail},'%')
and a.users_id IS NOT NULL
and users.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and users.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and users.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeEnd})
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
